page.title: 17Mayoral day, Chelmsford (1)
page.content: On July 13th 1985, 5 of us were privileged to{accompany the mayor and {mayoress on their long round of {official engagements.}We were collec- ted in the Daimler car at{13:15}and were amazed at the amount of room even with the girls' changes of dresses! The{first engagement}was at{Moulsham {High School P.A. Fete,}which the{may- {or officially opened.}We toured all the stalls, tried our luck on some and watched various displays before {leaving}in the car at{15:45. We{stopped}at the{mayor's house}and had cool refreshing drinks and then set off to{attend Broomfield Flower {Show.}We were received by the Show officers and toured the marquee which contained{fine exhibits}of{flowers, {fruit and vegetables.}After visiting the stalls we attended the{present- {ation of awards}at about{17:45.
